name: The GameDev Is A Liar
description:
Small unfinished game made in 1 week for the Community Game Jam 2019

With the Theme: "The Game is  a Liar"

Will you discover who killed BlackThornProd's game, The Dreadful Whispers? Go and collect clues and interrogate suspects such as Brackeys, Sykoo, Dani or Jabrils. 

Made with Unity 3d
